content:
PostDocs and PhD positions in trustworthy AI

The Algorithmic Decision Theory group at UNSW Sydney and Data61 is expanding. We have, in the first instance, four additional 5-year PostDocs and eight PhD positions. These positions are to explore issues around trustworthy AI such as fairness, transparency, explainability, auditability and privacy.

Positions start Jan 2021 or later. Competitive salaries and working conditions. Please contact Toby Walsh for details. tw@cse.unsw.edu.au

http://www.cse.unsw.edu.au/~tw/TrustworthyAI.pdf
